posts.post_content:
Hello. I have a few Hindu's I would like to trade, if anyone is interested:

1.) Hummell (Red Hindu) ... PSA 1.5 ... very attractive overall and a highly presentable back

2.) Geyer (Red Hindu) ... PSA 1 ... very attractive overall and a highly presentable back

3.) Marquard - HOF - hands at side (Brown Hindu) ... SGC 10 1

4.) Bell - hands above head (Brown Hindu) ... SGC 30 2 ... very solid back

5.) Wagner - bat on left shoulder (Brown Hindu) ... SGC 10 1 ... very solid back

*******

I am looking for the following: T206 backs ... Drum, Uzit, Lenox, Broad Leaf, Red Hindu, Carolina Brights, American Beauty 460, Cycle 460

Also, I am in the market for a T205 Joss in "high grade".

I have some other HOF cards etc. and we can include cash in any deal if necessary. I do not care about the actual grades on the cards, only the eye appeal. If you feel you have a suitable match, feel free to send me a PM and we can begin discussing trade proposals as well as exchanging pictures etc.

Thank you very much.

Derek
bump ... still searching for a good match

Hi all.... BUMP

The T206 Red Hindu Geyer (PSA 1) is still available. It is a nice little card with a very solid and presentable back. Let me know if you are interested. Thank you.

Derek
